summary: Provides a shared foundation for compatibility test configurators, offering utilities to load and persist configurations, inject and parse command‑line options, manage certificates and keys, deploy test artifacts, and orchestrate cleanup, restart, and recovery routines.
business_intent: Streamline the development of compatibility testing tools by supplying a reusable base that handles common configuration, argument parsing, certificate handling, deployment, and fault‑tolerant recovery, thereby reducing duplication and accelerating test setup.
